body_html: The gradients computed via tf.gradients() are actually correct as in the test file in OP, but they aren't being back propagated further down to earlier layers in actual networks. (I get zero gradients past a BN layer)

body: The gradients computed via `tf.gradients()` are actually correct as in the test file in OP, but they aren't being back propagated further down to earlier layers in actual networks. (I get zero gradients past a BN layer)
